history.proof: intros n m p H. apply Nge_ge_rev in H. hauto l: on depth: 3use: N, Nge_ge, ge_Nge.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n >= N.of_nat m -> (n >= m)%nat" on hypothesis of type "(N.to_nat (p + n) >= N.to_nat (p + m))%nat".

exceptions.tactic: apply (ge_Nge (N.to_nat p + N.to_nat n) (N.to_nat p + N.to_nat m) (N.to_nat n) H).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H : (N.to_nat (p + n) >= N.to_nat (p + m))%nat The term "N.to_nat n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "N.of_nat (N.to_nat p + N.to_nat n) >= N.of_nat (N.to_nat p + N.to_nat m)".

original: intros n m p H. apply Nge_ge_rev in H. apply ge_Nge in H. apply (ge_Nge (N.to_nat p + N.to_nat n) (N.to_nat p + N.to_nat m) (N.to_nat n) H). rewrite Nge_ge in H. apply (ge_Nge p n m H).
